articles.author: Geir Moulson
articles.title: Merkel receives standing ovation as German parliament opens with new leader - CTV News
articles.description: Germany's parliament elected Olaf Scholz as the country's ninth post-Second World War chancellor on Wednesday, opening a new era for the European Union's most populous nation and largest economy after Angela Merkel's 16-year tenure.
articles.content:
BERLIN --

articles.title: EU health bodies approve combined use of different Covid vaccines - pna.gov.ph

articles.title: Depleted Munster add 22 youngsters to European squad ahead of Champions Cup clash with Wasps - Independent.ie
articles.description: Recent Academy recruits Tony Butler, Patrick Campbell and Edwin Edogbo are among an additional 22 players who have been registered for Munster's Heineken Champions Cup squad.
